title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS  Clean your rusty cast iron skillet with… I freaking love bouillon base.  Flight attendants share holiday travel tips.  The fashion of the 1960s was supreme.  A guide to Gen Z and Gen Alpha slang.  New holiday stuff at Trader Joe’s to try!  Drinkable mayo is my worst nightmare.  What butter does Martha use for baking? I wonder what it feels like to swim through fish. If you need a drink for a crowd- Holiday Rum Punch!  Churches and their hidden bowling alleys.  Oregon Trail is going to be a movie?!  This hotel in Denver has incredible windows.  Have you seen a drone show? They look wild.  The best apps of 2024 according to Apple.  Let’s look at a whale eyeball. Whoa.  This green robe is on my wishlist. This leopard one too. Need some gift ideas? Check out my Amazon lists!  Or you could look through Oprah’s favorite things.  Weekend reading: The Let Them Theory      Join me and my dear friend and cohost of the Keep Grief Weird Podcast, Dr. MC McDonald, for another inspiring Intentions Setting Workshop next month to kick off 2025 with purpose and clarity. If you’re looking for time and space to process 2024, we are here to help!    In-Person Intentions Setting Workshop  Saturday, January 4  1PM-5:15PM PST (location: San Anselmo, CA) Experience connection, reflection, and guided exercises in a supportive environment designed to help you set meaningful intentions for the year ahead.      Can’t join us in person? Check out our:   Online Intentions Setting Workshop  Saturday, January 11  10AM-12PM PST (on Zoom) We’ve got you covered with an online version through our growing online circle community, The Hope Circuit. Create your 2025 vision with us from the comfort of your own space.  I added some new items to the shop! Currently workbooks coming this weekend!      Thank You Print      TO DO sticker        The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Welcome to I LOVE LISTS. It's Friday and Tracy of Shutterbean.com shares her finds from the internet on a weekly list called I LOVE LISTS!
text: I LOVE LISTS  Clean your rusty cast iron skillet with… I freaking love bouillon base.  Flight attendants share holiday travel tips.  The fashion of the 1960s was supreme.  A guide to Gen Z and Gen Alpha slang.  New holiday stuff at Trader Joe’s to try!  Drinkable mayo is my worst nightmare.  What butter does Martha use for baking? I wonder what it feels like to swim through fish. If you need a drink for a crowd- Holiday Rum Punch!  Churches and their hidden bowling alleys.  Oregon Trail is going to be a movie?!  This hotel in Denver has incredible windows.  Have you seen a drone show? They look wild.  The best apps of 2024 according to Apple.  Let’s look at a whale eyeball. Whoa.  This green robe is on my wishlist. This leopard one too. Need some gift ideas? Check out my Amazon lists!  Or you could look through Oprah’s favorite things.  Weekend reading: The Let Them Theory  Join me and my dear friend and cohost of the Keep Grief Weird Podcast, Dr. MC McDonald, for another inspiring Intentions Setting Workshop next month to kick off 2025 with purpose and clarity. If you’re looking for time and space to process 2024, we are here to help!  ✨ In-Person Intentions Setting Workshop 📅 Saturday, January 4 ⏰ 1PM-5:15PM PST (location: San Anselmo, CA) Experience connection, reflection, and guided exercises in a supportive environment designed to help you set meaningful intentions for the year ahead.  Can’t join us in person? Check out our: 💻 Online Intentions Setting Workshop 📅 Saturday, January 11 ⏰ 10AM-12PM PST (on Zoom) We’ve got you covered with an online version through our growing online circle community, The Hope Circuit. Create your 2025 vision with us from the comfort of your own space.  I added some new items to the shop! html:
I LOVE LISTS 

  1. Clean your rusty cast iron skillet with…
  2. I freaking love bouillon base. 
  3. Flight attendants share holiday travel tips. 
  4. The fashion of the 1960s was supreme. 
  5. A guide to Gen Z and Gen Alpha slang. 
  6. New holiday stuff at Trader Joe’s to try! 
  7. Drinkable mayo is my worst nightmare. 
  8. What butter does Martha use for baking?
  9. I wonder what it feels like to swim through fish.
  10. If you need a drink for a crowd- Holiday Rum Punch! 
  11. Churches and their hidden bowling alleys. 
  12. Oregon Trail is going to be a movie?! 
  13. This hotel in Denver has incredible windows. 
  14. Have you seen a drone show? They look wild. 
  15. The best apps of 2024 according to Apple. 
  16. Let’s look at a whale eyeball. Whoa. 
  17. This green robe is on my wishlist. This leopard one too.
  18. Need some gift ideas? Check out my Amazon lists! 
  19. Or you could look through Oprah’s favorite things. 
  20. Weekend reading: The Let Them Theory 

Join me and my dear friend and cohost of the Keep Grief Weird Podcast, Dr. MC McDonald, for another inspiring Intentions Setting Workshop next month to kick off 2025 with purpose and clarity. If you’re looking for time and space to process 2024, we are here to help! 

✨ In-Person Intentions Setting Workshop
📅 Saturday, January 4
⏰ 1PM-5:15PM PST

(location: San Anselmo, CA)

Experience connection, reflection, and guided exercises in a supportive environment designed to help you set meaningful intentions for the year ahead. 

Can’t join us in person? Check out our:

💻 Online Intentions Setting Workshop
📅 Saturday, January 11
⏰ 10AM-12PM PST (on Zoom)

We’ve got you covered with an online version through our growing online circle community, The Hope Circuit. Create your 2025 vision with us from the comfort of your own space. 

I added some new items to the shop! Currently workbooks coming this weekend! 

Thank You Print 

TO DO sticker
